title: Add page listing versions and changes
Add page with direct data download links
List rotationally identical sequences
Sequence hub flukes
body:
- Green - allow numerical / alpha-beit sorting by column value
- Red - sequence name should be clickable (**instead** / in addition to "View" button)
- Blue - Allow multiple clicks on the groups tick boxes (currently only one check-ed box allowed), and make the table auto-hide sequences from unticked boxes.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/41674327/121874331-f3000380-cd0f-11eb-95e3-10a1c5ef2d4c.png)

title: Sequence viewer flukes
body:
1. "Copy FASTA" button not implemented. Suggestion: discard it (users can ctrl+c if they want).  
2. Suggestion -  instead of single-click download, offer other stuff via drop down box.  
e.g. Download  ⮧

-  Fasta nucleic
- DBN
- Metadata filled JSON 
- forna pic as svg    
etc etc
3.  "MFE" and "Bases paired" not sourced

title: Layout and missing submit buttom
body:
Single column layout / shortish line wrapping, on regular MD pages (e.g. screen cap)
Also, submit page - form lacks a "submit" button.  

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/41674327/122774229-aee1a580-d2b1-11eb-8f28-47532cefe6b0.png)

title: Make SS view at bottom of page
Fix sequence routing
body:
Only a few of the routes actually work.
ie http://viroids.org/sequences/JF746187.1 is invalid

title: Restyle the new search results
body: With more attributes the results look bloated. This is not a huge deal

title: Add clear results button to search
body: I added `keep-alive` to `<Nuxt />` to fix the fact that it was clearing and losing place. However, now the only way to clear the search is manual. Could we get a button for that?

title: Don't display RZ hits if none present
Unify + and - SS view
Move SS legend to the SS card
Capitalize type in search page
Add copy/download buttons to Infernal output
sequence list page - color coding types and more
body:
1. Types color coding is no more by design?  
2.  satRNAs, Virus need fluffing, Viroids need sources.
3. Sequence list landing page - replace Lorem ipsum  


![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/41674327/123967219-c827d780-d9be-11eb-86c4-9743bd37685b.png)

title: Hide load more button on cluster page if all sequences loaded
Use periods consistently in seq view page
Link out to NCBI GenBank page for each rotationally identical sequence
Fix the navbar in a medium view
body: The addition of "community" tab makes the navbar overflow in certain sizes
